    • Method Detail

      • get

        public String get(User user,
                  String reference)
        Gets the translated String corresponding to the reference from the locale file for this user.
        Parameters:
        user - the User
        reference - a reference that can be found in a locale file
        Returns:
        the translated String from the User's locale or from the server's locale or from the en-US locale, or null.

      • getOrDefault

        public String getOrDefault(User user,
                           String reference,
                           String defaultText)
        Gets the translated String corresponding to the reference from the locale file for this user.
        Parameters:
        user - the User
        reference - a reference that can be found in a locale file
        defaultText - to return if the reference cannot be found anywhere
        Returns:
        the translated String from the User's locale or from the server's locale or from the en-US locale, or null.

      • get

        public String get(String reference)
        Gets the translated String corresponding to the reference from the server's or the en-US locale file.
        Parameters:
        reference - a reference that can be found in a locale file
        Returns:
        the translated String from the server's locale or from the en-US locale, or null.

      • getOrDefault

        public String getOrDefault(String reference,
                           String defaultText)
        Gets the translated String corresponding to the reference from the server's or the en-US locale file or if it cannot be found anywhere, use the default text supplied.
        Parameters:
        reference - a reference that can be found in a locale file
        defaultText - text to return if the reference cannot be found anywhere
        Returns:
        the translated String from the server's locale or from the en-US locale, or default.

      • copyLocalesFromAddonJar

        void copyLocalesFromAddonJar(Addon addon)
        Copies locale files from the addon jar to the file system and updates current locales with the latest references
        Parameters:
        addon - - addon

      • updateLocale

        private void updateLocale(Addon addon,
                          File fileLocaleFile,
                          String lf)

      • copyLocalesFromPluginJar

        private void copyLocalesFromPluginJar()
        Copies all the locale files from the plugin jar to the filesystem. Only done if the locale folder does not already exist.

      • loadLocalesFromFile

        public void loadLocalesFromFile(String localeFolder)
        Loads all the locales available in the locale folder given. Used for loading all locales from plugin and addons
        Parameters:
        localeFolder - - locale folder location relative to the plugin's data folder

      • copyFile

        private void copyFile(String name,
                      File targetFile)

      • getAvailableLocales

        public List<Locale> getAvailableLocales(boolean sort)
        Gets a list of all the locales loaded
        Parameters:
        sort - - if true, the locales will be sorted by language tag
        Returns:
        list of locales

      • getLanguages

        public Map<Locale,BentoBoxLocale> getLanguages()
        Returns:
        raw map of system locales to BentoBox locales

      • reloadLanguages

        public void reloadLanguages()
        Reloads all the language files from the filesystem

      • analyzeLocales

        public void analyzeLocales(boolean fix)
        Loads all the locales available in the locale folder given. Used for loading all locales from plugin and addons.
        Parameters:
        fix - whether or not locale files with missing translations should be fixed. Not currently supported.
        Since:
        1.5.0

      • analyze

        private void analyze(User user,
                     boolean fix)
        Parameters:
        user -
        fix - whether or not locale files with missing translations should be fixed. Not currently supported.
        Since:
        1.5.0
